lore: The forces of Undolim ambushed the invaders from the rooftops of the Cathedral square, using arrows and spells. When the enemy fled in disarray to regroup, the Gargoyles descended like rain with their claws and fangs of stone.\n\nThe Nightwing Gargoyle uses the influence of the moon to absorb the magic of its surroundings. During a new moon phase, this creature perches on the ledge of a colorful building and remains motionless, waiting for it to end.
menagerieDialog: It is imperative that we always have a backup plan in case our original strategy doesn't work out.
(It's not moving at all. Not one bit, in fact. It's still as stone.)
(This creature could easily be mistaken for a statue.)
name: Nightwing Gargoyle
